quotes.quote: There's nothing worse than a brilliant beginning.
A brilliant man would find a way not to fight a war.
There is a brilliant child locked inside every student.
Being brilliant is no great feat if you respect nothing.
How we learn has nothing to do with how brilliant we are.
Our children are only as brilliant as we allow them to be.
You weren't born to fit in. You were born to be brilliant.
Humans: such a brilliant model of emotional self-awareness.
Don't trust a brilliant idea unless it survives the hangover.
It's brilliant, being depressed; you can behave as badly as you like.
Brilliant people never think of the lives they smash, being brilliant.
Operating in an unlit world, the unconscious mind is a brilliant detective.
Do you want a collection of brilliant minds or a brilliant collection of minds?
Surrounded yourself with brilliant people. You can't HELP but grow when that happens.
The most brilliant fortunes are often not worth the littleness required to gain them.
Behind every brilliant performance there were countless hours of practice and preparation.
The most brilliant qualities become useless when they are not sustained by force of character.
A brilliant mind was never as clever as three average minds sniffing after something of interest.
There is no idea so brilliant or original that a sufficiently-untalented writer can't screw it up.
The most successful and brilliant work a lighting designer can do is usually the least noticeable.
There are very few really brilliant men who have not had at least one madman among their ancestors.
There are fine things that are more brilliant when they are unfinished than when finished too much.
The true test of a brilliant theory is what first is thought to be wrong is later shown to be obvious.
If you can talk brilliantly about a problem, it can create the consoling illusion that it has been mastered.
The most brilliant flashes of wit come from a clouded mind, as lightning leaps only from an obscure firmament.
Champions are brilliant at the basics.
Being in the desert was brilliant and it was hard.
If you're brilliant and open-minded, you can start at the top.
A brilliant design will always benefit from the input of others.
Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
It's always a struggle to make things sound more or less brilliant.
Everyone we regard as brilliant has endured an enormous amount of failure.
Brilliant strategy is the best route to desirable ends with available means.
A perfect conversation would run much less to brilliant sentences than to unfinished ones.
There are many really stupid ideas that wind up being brilliant, if you can implement them.
One of my main goals in life is to make those that believed in me look extremely brilliant.
You can have brilliant ideas, but if you can't get them across, your ideas won't get you anywhere.
There are plenty of brilliant people who are too stressed out to read challenging literary novels.
A dull speech which is full of truths is much more brilliant than an eloquent speech which is full of lies!
Brilliant results don't just show up by chance. The finest things in life take patience, focus and sacrifice.
The key to getting a reputation for being brilliant is actually being brilliant, not just acting like you are.
